abstract: Waits until the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderTask] finishes and returns.
overview:
## Discussion

Synchronously blocks execution until the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderTask] either completes or fails (with error).  Calling this method after [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext/startTask(toRender:to:)] or [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext/startTask(toRender:from:to:at:)] makes the render task behave synchronously, as if the CPU and GPU were operating as a single unit.

# waitUntilCompleted()

**Instance Method**

Waits until the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderTask] finishes and returns.

## Declaration

```swift
func waitUntilCompleted() throws -> CIRenderInfo
```

## Discussion

Synchronously blocks execution until the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIRenderTask] either completes or fails (with error).  Calling this method after [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext/startTask(toRender:to:)] or [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIContext/startTask(toRender:from:to:at:)] makes the render task behave synchronously, as if the CPU and GPU were operating as a single unit.
title: waitUntilCompleted()
